christmas_blog_description: Share up to 5 images about Christmas from your country!
connect_globe_description: We CAPTURE the Christmas spirit from around the globe.
share_christmas_description: Share your Christmas with the world!
guest_visit_description: Don't need an account to share your Christmas moment!
share_moment_text: Share festive moments from around the globe in our Christmas blog without an account.
place_to_go: Place you would like to go
faq_answer_1: Rejouir is a blog platform that shares Christmas moment with images and information for you to plan your trip around the world.
faq_question_2: Do we need an account to upload images?
faq_answer_2: No! You can upload images without an account. We want to simplify the process of sharing your Christmas moment.
faq_answer_3: We build Christmas community and create contents with passion. And one of the reason is to centralize Christmas contents not just from other social media.
faq_question_4: Where we can contact Rejouir team?
faq_answer_4: You can contact us via email via
faq_question_5: How many images we can upload?
faq_answer_5: We offer 5 images at most for each upload. We want to keep the quality of the content and not to spam the platform.
footer_description: We make Christmas one step closer around the globe, and share your precious moment.
